  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_78683</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_78683</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">La formation de basalte lorsque les plats tectoniques se séparent</string>
            <string language="en">Basalt formation as tectonic plates move apart</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Basaltanordnung als tectonic Platten trennen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A formação do basalt como placas tectonic 
coloca de lado</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La formazione del basalto come piastre tettoniche
separa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχηματισμός βασαλτών ως τεκτονική κίνηση πιάτων 
χώρια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La formación del basalto como placas tectónicas
separa</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration prouve que le magma remplit l'intervalle entre deux plats mobiles et forme roche plutonique appelée le basalte quand le magma refroidit.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that magma fills the gap between two moving plates and forms igneous rock called basalt as the magma cools down.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">basalte</string>
            <string language="en">basalt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">mouvement de croûte</string>
            <string language="en">crust movement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">roche plutonique</string>
            <string language="en">igneous rock</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">magma</string>
            <string language="en">magma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">plats tectoniques</string>
            <string language="en">tectonic plates</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Magma den Abstand 
zwischen zwei beweglichen Platten und Eruptivgestein der Formulare 
füllt, die Basalt genannt werden, während das Magma unten abkühlt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que o magma enche a 
abertura entre duas placas moventes e a rocha igneous dos formulários
chamadas basalt enquanto o magma esfria para baixo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che il magma colma lo
spacco fra due piastre commoventi e la roccia eruttiva delle forme 
chiamate basalto mentre il magma si raffredda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι το μάγμα καλύπτει το 
κενό μεταξύ δύο κινούμενων πιάτων και διαμορφώνει τον πύρινο 
βράχο αποκαλούμενο βασάλτη καθώς το μάγμα δροσίζει κάτω.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que el magma llena el 
boquete entre dos placas móviles y la roca ígnea de las formas 
llamadas basalto mientras que el magma se refresca abajo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Basalt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Krustebewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eruptivgestein</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">tectonic Platten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">basalt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
